results.name: A Little Walk in the Woods (2023)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 20H2 (October 2020 Update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8120
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 4GB, Radeon RX 460 4GB

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1300MHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX5500

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3+/AMD @ 2.4+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 400x, Intel HD 4x, AMD Radeon 7xxx +
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel-based (x86-64)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 core Intel or AMD processor, 2.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: 6 core Intel or AMD processor, 3.3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan/OpenGL 4.5 capable GPU
  • Sound Card: Broadband internet connection (if online features are present)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 470 @ 1GB / ATI® Radeon™ HD 6970 @ 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K / Core™ i7-4770 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580 - DirectX 12.0 compatible system
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 Or Higher
  • Processor: Quad Core | 2.6 GHZ +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
